Remember that God's people are but a little flock compared with the professedly Christian world and the myriads of world-adoring men and women. They are to be Bible Christians, examples to our youth of righteousness and exactness in all things. Every influence surrounding the young 
                                                                           480
should be of a holy character, and this influence should begin in our own families. The sacred and the common should not be commingled.
